鳽鳽鳽

鳽字的基本解释

鳽
jiān
鵁鶄，即“池鹭”，一种水鸟。
动物学中鹭科鸟的通称：黑鳽。大麻鳽。黄斑苇鳽。

鳽
qiān
鶺鴒，一种嘴尖尾长的小鸟。

鳽
zhān
古同“鸇”。

鳽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》古賢切，平先，見。］
［《廣韻》五堅切，平先，疑。］
［《廣韻》五革切，入麥，疑。］
鸟名。鵁鶄的别称。

鳽字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鳽； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1483第23
【五音類聚】音硏。【正字通】俗鳽字。鳽字从幵。

【廣韻】五革切【集韻】逆革切，?音虉。【爾雅·釋鳥】鳽，鵁鶄。【郭註】似鳧。又【唐韻】古賢切【集韻】經天切，?音堅。【說文】鵁鶄也。又【廣韻】五堅切【集韻】倪堅切，?音姸。又【集韻】丘耕切，音鏗。又輕煙切，音牽。義?同。又與雃同。【說文】石鳥。一名雝渠。一名精列。又【集韻】鸇，古作鳽。註詳十三畫。鳽字从幵。
鳽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鳽字的起名意思

暂无。

Bitter
Basic explanation of words
Bitter
jiān
鵁鶄, namely "pool heron", a kind of water bird.
The general term for heron in zoology: black bitter. Marijuana bitter. Yellow-spot bitten bitter.
Bitter
qiān
Wagtail, a small bird with a pointed beak and a long tail.
Bitter
zhān
The ancient same "Swan".
Bitter
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" Gu Xianqie, Pingxian, see you. ]
["Guangyun" five hard cuts, flat first, doubt. ]
["Guangyun" five leather cuts, into wheat, doubt. ]
The name of the bird. Another name for 鵁鶄.
Bitter
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鳽; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1483 Page 23
【Pentaphony Class】Yin Hao. 【Zhengzitong】vulgar bitter. The word bitch is from the unity. [Guangyun] Five leather cuts [Jiyun] Reverse leather cuts,? Yinqi. 【Erya·Shiniao】鵁鶄. [Guo's Note] Like a mallard. Also [Tang Yun] Ancient Xian cut [Ji Yun] through heaven,? Yin Jian. [Said the text] 鵁鶄也. Also [Guang Yun] Five Jianqie【Jiyun】Ni Jianqie,? Yin 姸. Also 【Ji Yun】Qiu Gengqie, Yin Keng. The smoke cuts lightly again, and the sound is pulled. Righteous? Same. Same with Yu. [Said the text] Stone bird. One Yongqu. One fine line. Also 【Jiyun】鹯, an ancient bite. Note 13 pictures in detail. The word bitch is from the unity.
Bitter

Name meaning
Nothing.
yán
сущ. уст. Nycticorax prasinosceles (один из видов кваквы из сем. цапель)
